titleStmt.title: Vox cæli; or, philosophical, historicall, and theological [brace] observations, of thunder. With a more general view of Gods wonderful works. First grounded on Job 26. 14. but now enlarged into this treatise. / By Robert Dingley, M.A. once fellow of Magdalen Colledge in Oxford; now minister of Gods Word at Brixton in the Isle of Wight, and County of Southampton.
titleStmt.author: Dingley, Robert, 1619-1660.

titleStmt.title: Vox cæli; or, philosophical, historicall, and theological [brace] observations, of thunder. With a more general view of Gods wonderful works. First grounded on Job 26. 14. but now enlarged into this treatise. / By Robert Dingley, M.A. once fellow of Magdalen Colledge in Oxford; now minister of Gods Word at Brixton in the Isle of Wight, and County of Southampton.
titleStmt.author: Dingley, Robert, 1619-1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M S. for Henry Cripps, and are to be sold at his shop in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: The words "philosophical .. theological" are bracketed together on title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
